1.title: Extreme Mustang Makeovers and ERA Pinup Calendar Photoshoot
1.plot: Join Meg Drake as Ride on the Road travels across the country for a look into our equestrian world; exploring the stories, the people and the horses that inspire us. In this episode: Extreme Mustang Makeover Missouri and Idaho, ERA Pinup Calendar Photoshoot.

2.title: Extreme Mustang Makeovers and US Drill Team Association
2.plot: "We visit the last two stops on the Extreme Mustang Makeover tour - Topsfield, MA and Fort Worth, TX - to see what trainers can do with a wild mustang in just 100 days. We also check out the US Drill Team Association and see these teams of riders pull off amazing maneuvers on horseback."

3.title: Texas Bronc Riders Assoc. & Scholarship Shootout
3.plot: "We stop in on the Texas Bronc Riders Association Finals and Scholarship Shootout and visit with some fresh faces in the bronc riding world, an up and coming High School Senior and two tough bronc riding ladies."

4.title: Lincoln Cowboy Symposium
4.plot: "What does young country music star Mikki Daniel have in common with a Mountain Man Historian, Chuck Wagon Chef and Cowboy Mounted Shooters? They're all here in Ruidoso, New Mexico at the Lincoln County Cowboy Symposium. Where many walks of life come together for one amazing weekend."

5.title: Texas Classic and Guthrie, OK
5.plot: "Go on the road with Meg Drake; A famous bull rider learns to cut, a youth calf roping in Guthrie Oklahoma, a charity fundraiser for horses, and an exclusive look at the Texas Classic."

6.title: PBR Iron Cowboy
6.plot: Ride on the Road visits the Iron Cowboy at AT&T Stadium. Get a look inside the competition with Ryan Dirteater, Reese Cates and the man who put on the show, PBR's Production Manager Jim L. White.

7.title: Cinch Timed Event Rodeo
7.plot: Meg Drake takes us to Guthrie Oklahoma and the Lazy E ranch to catch up on the Cinch Timed Event Rodeo.

8.title: Equine Affaire
8.plot: Meg Drake visits the heartland of America, Columbus, Ohio, for the Equine Affaire. A large variety of horse breeds, horsemanship, shows and equipment is on display at the Ohio State Fairgrounds, all capped by the incredible "Fantasia" horse show.

9.title: Ranch Readiness Day
9.plot: California has seen its fair share of natural disasters. Meg Drake goes to Sonoma County California to attend the Ranch Readiness Day and learn what it means to be prepared for not only yourself, but for your horses when faced with disaster.

10.title: Alysheba
10.plot: Host Carly Twisselman tells the story of Alysheba, a thoroughbred racehorse that won two legs of the Triple Crown in 1987.

imdb.plot outline: Get an insider's look into today's equestrian world with RIDE TV's RIDE On The Road. Join show host, Meg Drake as she travels to equine events across the country bringing viewers stories about the people and horses involved in the industry. From Extreme Mustang Makeover events to cowboy symposiums, RIDE On The Road covers a broad range of events, disciplines and equine-related topics.
